name: Plantage Berlin
description:
We want to give brands a meaning for the people. We have to be as creative as we are wise because ideas and strategies make our programs powerful and special.
Our Services
Brand Strategy, Branded Programs, Film, Out of Home, Print, Funk, Digital Engagement, Social Media Strategy and Creation, Community Management, Shopper Activation, B2B Activation, and Design (Branding, Corporate, Packaging).
